quotes.quote: One whisper, added to a thousand others, becomes a roar of discontent.
It is harder to kill a whisper than even a shouted calumny.
Ever notice that the whisper of temptation can be heard farther than the loudest call to duty.
A whisper can be stronger, as an atom is stronger, than a whole mountain.
It is impossible that the whisper of a faction should prevail against the voice of a nation.
That whisper you keep hearing is the universe trying to get your attention.
Listen to the whisperings of the Spirit, the gift of revelation to which you are entitled.
His whisper was the softest sound I ever knew, which seemed to bring the loudest heartbeat.
Ignore the whisper of fear, let your inner ability to take over because it's meant to be your guide.
All whispers and echoes from a past that is gone teem into the sleeper's brain, and he is with them, and part of them.
Within the whispers of love, I found my heart. Within a glimmer from a ray, I found my soul. Within both, I found myself.
Sometimes you want to whisper in God's ear, 'God, we know you are in charge, but why don't you make it slightly more obvious?'
The whisper of a pretty girl can be heard further than the roar of a lion.
Listen to the whispers or soon you will be listening to the screams.
Our murmuring is the devil's music.
Let choice whisper in your ear and love murmur in your heart. Be ready. Here comes life.
We are more prone to murmur at the punishment of our faults than to lament them.
Listen to the murmur of water and you'll hear Mother Nature.Listen to the stillness beneath, and there you'll find God.

The murmurs of many a famous river on the other side of the globe reach even to us here, as to more distant dwellers on its banks;many a poet's stream, floating the helms and shields of heroes on its bosom.
The whispering of the truth is stronger than the thunderstorm of the untruth!
When you whisper about something, it's too big, and you can't get it under control and take control of it.
I want to whisper poetry into your mind and imprint love letters to your soul and dance with you in an empty white room of potential
The whispers of shared ecstasy are choral.
The whisper of the dusk is night shedding its husk.
In the whisper of the leaves appears an interchange of love.
No matter how softly you whisper a prayer, God hears and understands.
Sometimes a whisper speaks volumes.
God whispers to us in our pleasures, speaks in our conscience, but shouts in our pain: it is His megaphone to rouse a deaf world.
Now come the whispers bearing bouquets of moonbeams and sunlight tremblings.
As for murmurs, mother, we grumble a little now and then, to be sure; but there's no love lost between us.
